attributes.action: Ensure that all goverment workers are entitled to Key worker housing. And not just a select few.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Key worker housing should be made available to all those that work in the government. For example. I work in the prison service as an Admin officer, But i am not entitled to Key working housing as i don't  come in the category of Prison officer, Officer support grade, teacher or nurse. All jobs within the establishment contribute to the end goal of protecting the public. So why should some job have more benefits then others?
